name: jQuery Superbox! Image
author: Weldan Jamili

sections.description:
Another wordpress plugin to enable image overlay on blog post.

jQuery superbox! plugin is a light sized plugin to overlay html element,
one can view image from post without have to leave current page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload jquery-superbox-image folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done. Try clicking on any image in your posts
sections.faq:
What is this?

A plugin to let you view image without leave current page. They called it lightbox effect as far i remember

I know, why you only let image?

Because i only need image. If you need customization just let me know. At least i know someone using it.

short_description: Yet another plugin to enable lightbox effect in your post. Using jQuery Superbox! plugin
